website_summaries.verdict: Choose this three-person hunting blind if you need some extra space or like to hunt with friends.
pros: Offers ample room for two adults and gear, and although a bit crammed, can fit as many as three people
Windows are located in a user-friendly position and easy to adjust
Material resists moisture and has a camouflage pattern that's easy to conceal
cons: Challenging and time-consuming to set up
A few durability concerns, such as broken poles and torn straps

customer_reviews.title: it's OK
customer_reviews.text: Well, to start off, this is my first ground blind. At times it is a little difficult to put up and even harder to take down even when doing it like the instructional video says. The plastic pieces that are connected to the mesh and cammo screens come off easily if you're not careful. as far as being a 3 person blind. Sure, if you're back to back really close or scrawny and short and don't want to be able to move around much at all. There are hundreds of tiny holes in it where everything is sewn together. I WOULD NOT BUY AGAIN This may be a good outdoor play house for kids
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! VERY CHEAP BLIND! JUNK JUNK JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: I received a used blind that already was set up and damaged. The poles fall out of the little sleeves there supposed to stay in. For the price it should be a better blind. Set up in living room. Opening up the blind the poles where poking through the material (holes). Shame on the place that shipped out a used damaged blind.
customer_reviews.author: squirrel dog

customer_reviews.title: Great blind BUT
customer_reviews.text: Once you get it put together it's nice. BUT when I opened the package, like a lot of other reviewers on here, some of the rods were out of place and it took me 45 minutes to untangle and get together. Pretty much a pita. But once done...it's got plenty of room and great field of view.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good boomd but No directions - Frustrating Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Blind seems to be great now that it's up. It was tangled up in the bag and came with no directions. Very frustrating to put up, but now that it's up, I'm hoping it works out well for deer season
customer_reviews.author: Brooks L.

customer_reviews.title: 👎
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with instructions. Top and one side twisted in on itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Rhino blinds are ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the slide windows very nice camo pattern , but the back window puddles water they should have seamed the flap on the ouside to eliminate the problem , the other issue is mine leaks at the top center pop up allowing water to run down the poles and drip on you. The issue's i have are pictured
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is poor quality at its finest, I bought two thank god, went out to set one up and the hub pole for the roof broke when I popped it up, I’ll never buy anything from rhino again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse W.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. Sewed the carry case onto his backpack for hikes into the woods. He’s picky and is very happy with the quality, so that says a lot. Not sure why one man needs a 3 person blind - it’s really roomy. But he is very happy with it! That’s all that matters!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty expensive for someone else’s return...
customer_reviews.text: Must have been a return from someone else. No directions and came in a mangled taped up box and blind was a mess inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, easy, big windows.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to setup, quiet, sliding windows, and door with a latch. Awesome blind for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great blind for the price. I definitely recommend this blind.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the view. The screen slides at cool. Set up and take down is quick and easy. The only thing that could be better? A zipper on the top so a guy 6’ tall can stand up and look out.
customer_reviews.author: Glen vetter

customer_reviews.title: Worst blind I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made blind...first hunt in it rained and it leaked bad. Door is just clips that are a pain to get on and off pole. The windows have a ledge that collects water and makes windows sag inward. Do not plan on it lasting very long.
customer_reviews.author: Tim huffman

customer_reviews.title: It is functional but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Product sets up and tears down fairly easily. It did not come with directions which would have been beneficial for the initial setup. One of the window hooks was broken and the loops are not durable at all, after a few uses they are already starting to fray.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: this Army disabled Veteran is keeping it.
customer_reviews.text: Ive decided to give as a gift and want to cancel return and ill purchase the onevi need later.thanks
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this blind. Easy to put up, very spacious, blended right in with the background (mossy oak). A great product
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good blind
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. The box came damaged and the blind was broke.
customer_reviews.author: reiss coole

customer_reviews.title: Good hunting stand
customer_reviews.text: Nice to set up, lots of room. The windows are quit to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Graf

customer_reviews.title: Don't order online
customer_reviews.text: this may have been a good product but obviously someone sent it back and then was shipped to me. No instructions. Half of the rods were on the inside and half out. Took about an hour to straighten it out and get it up. Then had a lot of stress tears in it. Too much trouble to take it down and send back. Might be a good product but I will never order anything like this online.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Really like this tent. Only issue I had was using the chinsy stakes they send.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Otto

customer_reviews.title: Can't handle the weather
customer_reviews.text: Total POS. Got 3 inches of fluffy snow overnight and the whole thing collapsed. 4 poles snapped and now it's useless. A ground blind that can't handle a couple inches of snow is pathetic considering a good portion of the country gets snow during the hunting seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: holy blind i do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: product was not a one man set up like they claim the material was stuck between pivoting arms and tore now i have a brand new blind with a hole on the roof the door clip was hanging on by a string.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total Crap, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Total junk, it came all twisted up and had to completely remove everything, finally got it together 3 hours later. Collapsed it and almost every brace came out of the pockets, making it have to be put together all over again. Don’t buy total crap!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Horst

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if I should set it up , or send it back?
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd delivery I have received with a ripped open box. I don't even know if someone already used it and put it back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice hunting blind plenty of room but too many connections for the screens. Would be nice if there were fewer adjustments. Still a good solid blind to hunt out of
customer_reviews.author: duke361

customer_reviews.title: Good with caveats
customer_reviews.text: Good visibility inside. Little heavy. Not good for warmth or keeping out rain. Good prices. Good size inside. No zippers are quieter but you sacrifice keeping heat in. I’d say it’s a very good blind for warmer climates.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly925

product_meta.title: Rhino Blinds R150 3 Person Hunting Ground Blind
feature_bullets: R150 fits 3 people and has a 66" Center height, hub to hub 75" X 75", and floor space 58" X 58"
Constructed of a true 150 denier polyester - 150 denier thread in both the horizontal and vertical weave
Rhino Blinds are easy to set up and take down - with a little practice setting the blind up can be accomplished quickly in as little as 60 seconds Once the blind is out of the carry bag
Reliable Hunting – Rhino Blinds give you the confidence to set up your blind and leave it for days without worry, allowing your blind to become one with the surrounding habitat

Rhino Blinds are built tough and designed to withstand the most inclement weather conditions you dare to be caught in; rain, snow, hail, wind. If game is bedded down due to bad weather, you should gladly hunt another day

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
